name: Carl Johan Fahlcrantz
obverse: Bust of Carl Johan Fahlcrantz facing right.
reverse: An easel crowned by a wreath with painting tools and books below.
references: Kungl. Vitterhets, Historie Och Antikvitets Akademiens Handlingar, Volume 16
description: This medal was made to commemorate Carl Johan Fahlcrantz, a famous Swedish painter known for his landscape paintings.
This medal is part of a series of noted Swedish scientists and artists.
